title: Experience-Based Conflict Management Workshop for Strengthening Entrepreneurial Team Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic entrepreneurship concepts and workplace team project experience
context.additional_context: Internal corporate program aiming to strengthen innovation entrepreneurship competencies of science field workers. Considers smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for constructively managing cognitive conflicts arising in entrepreneurial teams through simulation tasks
Learners can apply a 5-step conflict resolution process to propose practical solutions when interpersonal conflicts occur during team projects
Learners can identify two major factors hindering team performance using a teamwork competency diagnostic tool and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
